tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Happy and satisfied with the doctors approach for diagnosis and treatment...She listens very patiently to all queries and examines in detail regarding symptoms related to the disease...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Such a warm and friendly doctor! She asked a lot of questions and prescribed medicines and tests for follow up. Great recommendation and very patient doctor! Definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor was very patient , heard every detail of my complaint .  Did a thorough physical check up and correctly diagonised my condition . I responded very well to the medicines prescribed by her and soon  felt better . I appreciate her understanding  and empathetic approach .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: patient listener, explained well. tests suggested were bare minimum and only if the symptoms didn't go after initial medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife found this wonderful doctor via google search. The appointment time was simple and prompt. Main aspect we liked about this doctor is her patience to listen to my health issues one-by-one. It was so relaxed to be in this clinic as it was like a home rather than a medical facility. I have been following the doctor's advice and seems my health is getting back to normal. We just requested for her support on top of my current Ayurvedic treatment and she was reading to help me out. *** ** *** **** ******* * **** ******** ********* *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I booked the appointment for my grand mother for fever,cough,urine infection and saliva problem.Initially we thought it was covid and were really scared as where to go from our village and somehow i got the appointment of this doctor and she suggested minimal blood and urine tests and identified it as urine infection.Doctor talks with the patient and tries to understand the exact problem.She might suggest minimal tests to identify the problem and prescribe few medications which would rectify it. i would suggest anyone to visit her because of her vast experience, way of treatment and her friendliness

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She treated both my Mother-in-law and father-in-law.Initially we consulted Doctor through online ,for my mother-in-law got infected with fever ,bodypain and cold.We stay in kavali and during lockdown we hardly found hospital open.Then my wife suggested me practo app.We  searched for the doctor and found Dr Mahalakshmi.Her service and experience really impressed us.But question is how the doctor can treat virtually.Beleave  me,she is simply awesome.Just by treating virtually ,she made my mother-in-law healthy.Then with this confidence ,we consulted her for my father-in-law.He is covid positive and diabetic.She, again like godess treated him very well.Now he become normal.Her friendliness,Liserning ,observation,careing to patient were very good.She used to respond to messages that I used to ask her  at 12 AM at night in whatsapp.I am giving this  review with my personal experience.Thought  this will help others

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I've had depression and anxiety since a year ago or so.. i am currently going to a psychologist and psychiatrist, some medicines were giving me severe side-effects so they suggested to go to a physician... I've looked up her and decided to see her in an online session coz of the good feedbacks I've read from other patients... during the session she criticized me about all the medicines i was taking and said without knowing what i went through that "i am very pampered and just need a slap" and was dismissing it laughingly..* * ** *** ***** ** **** *** ********* **** ********* *** she shouldn't say such things to any patient
reply_text: I would like to clarify on your feedback. I was not criticising on your treatment at all.  I just wanted to boost up your mood advising you to talk with your family regularly and added, purely in jest and with motherly affection, that a slap from an elder will do you good!  Now I understand that this statement, made purely in a lighter vein, has not gone well with you.  Sorry for the misunderstanding that this has caused.  Good to know that you felt better with my treatment.

- Doctor initiated the call on time
- Detailed diagnosis, no rush, asked all relevant question to identify the root cause

- insha allah,  hoping for speedy recovery** *** *********** ** ** *** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** her  experience shows in her quality work.

Thank you Doctor and Practo team.
